tool_description: Convert and Reverse Text that dont let your wife,husband,BF and GF know, the Secret Text in integer format and token keep change every day which mean the text  can be reversed today only
title: Secret Text

api_list.name: reverse
api_list.description: reverse the Secret Text to Text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secret-text.p.rapidapi.com/reverse"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secret-text.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
